{
    "name": "Plane Gravitational Wave Metric in Harmonic Gauge",
    "abbrev": "planeGravitationalWaveMetric",
    "description": "A spacetime metric that describes a gravitational wave propagating in a plane, typically used in the study of gravitational wave astronomy and the detection of gravitational waves.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,

    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "PlaneGravitationalWave",
            "xlineElement": "ds² = (1 + 2 \* \*m / (r \* sqrt(x² + y²))) \* (dx² + dy²) - (1 - 2 \* \*m / (r \* sqrt(x² + y²))) \* dt²",
            "validated": false
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
